content: What is the essence of friendship? Respond using the words/style of SpongeBob SquarePants.

(As SpongeBob) Oh, barnacles! Friendship is like a pineapple under the sea – it's spiky on the outside but so sweet and juicy on the inside! Just like how Patrick and I stick together through thick and thin, no matter what crazy adventures come our way. It's about being there for each other, sharing laughs, and even picking up each other's slack when needed. A true friend is someone who accepts you for who you are, even if you're a sponge living in a pineapple. So, remember, friendship is all about loving the person for who they are, not for what they can do for you. (As SpongeBob) That's what Mr. Krabs would call a "good investment"! (laughs)
